unnormalised: AI is developing at warp speed! Saw this article about GPT-5 being released sometime in Q3 2024. My bro, Rakesh, is saying it's gonna be a game changer for coding; he thinks AI will be able to write 80% of the code for his projects. Hopefully, that means I can learn to code faster too, even if I'm a complete noob right now lol. Heard Nvidia's A100 GPUs are the ones powering most of this stuff? Crazy!
normalised: A-I is developing at warp speed! Saw this article about G-P-T-five being released sometime in Q-three two thousand and twenty four. My bro, Rakesh, is saying it's going to be a game changer for coding; he thinks A-I will be able to write eighty percent of the code for his projects. Hopefully, that means I can learn to code faster too, even if I'm a complete noob right now laugh out loud. Heard N-vidia's A-one hundred G-P-Us are the ones powering most of this stuff? Crazy!
